Dance.1: Demonstrate advanced skills in modern dance technique.
Dance.2: Demonstrate knowledge of ballet terminology and technique at the intermediate level.
Dance.3: Demonstrate a working knowledge of the history of dance as it relates to the dance forms studied.
Dance.4: Create dances and dance compositions, which incorporate individual concepts and movement inventions.
Dance.5: Develop and implement class plans for ballet and modern dance technique classes.
Dance.6: Demonstrate an understanding of the kinesiologically-based principles of safe and injury-free dance training.
